channel.title: Chromes on My Learn Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Chromes on My Learn Notes

item.title: Chrome Dev Tips
item.description: copy object as string copy(someObj) on elements panel you can copy any element path:right click -> copy->copy js path you can get document.querySelector(some element) #on network panel you can copy xhr response :select link then right click -> copy->copy response you can get connection information by window.navigator.connection New in Chrome 73: Code folding. Enable it via Settings > Preferences > Sources > Code folding
